data.text:
@Gage_Ass_Pack @mfa_russia @Ukraine He's been trying to project an image of strength and courage during over 20 years, judo fighting, hunting and fishing topless etc. And calling Zelensky "beauty" like if he was a wimp.
Ends up he's just an old man afraid of a virus and taking ridiculously excessive precautions.
@Nicolas83530513 @mfa_russia @Ukraine putin has been doing this since covid reached russia. also what are you accusing him with? taking precautions?

@Gage_Ass_Pack @mfa_russia @Ukraine Yes but really have you seen *any* world leader keeping such an insane distance with nearly everyone ?
Either he's sick and immunocompromised, or this is a complete irrational fear, not matching with the macho man he pretends to be. https://t.co/56YcjfIdvM
@Nicolas83530513 @mfa_russia @Ukraine yeah because covid still exists? just because a war started doesnt mean covid is no longer existant

@Gage_Ass_Pack @mfa_russia @Ukraine Yes it is. But you can take one of him in the streets of Kiev 2-3 days ago if you prefer, the point still stands compared to the long distance Putin always keeps even with "close"  advisers... https://t.co/l2e6Q6G9Ip
@Nicolas83530513 @mfa_russia @Ukraine bottom pic is from last year
@Nicolas83530513 @mfa_russia @Ukraine Mr. Putin has been dominated by Mr. Xi Jinping and the malice of the Chinese Communist Party, has pushed Mr. Putin to bring troops to fight his own cousins.
@Nicolas83530513 @mfa_russia @Ukraine Putin is a Nazi - de-nazify russia!

@elf1ansoisreal Où est la désinformation ? Il est à Kyiv près du front et il refuse de se faire exfiltrer. Bien sûr ils ne l'ont pas envoyé en première ligne ce n'est pas un soldat, mais il est au contact de son armée contrairement à Poutine caché au Kremlin.
